snippet.title: PixelJunk Monsters 2 Announcement Trailer (PS4/Steam/Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
ESRB: E10+

From Q-Games, we're bringing tower defense favorite PixelJunk™ Monsters 2 to the PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and Steam® for North America and Europe this May 25 for $14.99!

Official site: http://spike-chunsoft.co.jp/pjm2
